name: Lutz & Taran Emilion
appearance: Two well-groomed men with a professional, approachable look typical of experienced bartenders; they appear attentive and accustomed to dealing with customers from all walks of life.
personality: Sociable, observant, discreet, and emotionally perceptive; they are good listeners who know how to keep conversations flowing without revealing too much themselves.
background: Lutz and Taran Emilion work together as bartenders. Through their daily interactions with patrons, they have developed strong people-reading skills and a habit of quietly collecting information. Their work has made them familiar with local rumors, personal dramas, and subtle changes in the townâ€™s atmosphere.
goals: Maintain smooth operation of their bar
Avoid becoming entangled in dangerous affairs
notes: As bartenders, Lutz and Taran are a reliable source of social information and local gossip, though they rarely volunteer sensitive details without prompting.
